text: Forget Me Nots and Remind Me is another greatest hits compilation album by released by the record label Edoya based on the R&B; singer Patrice Rushen. Released on June 3, 1996. ==Track listing== #Music of the Earth #Cha - Cha #Forget Me Nots #Haven't You Heard #Never Gonna Give You Up #Remind Me #When I Found You #When There Is Love #Heartache Heartbreak #Settle for My Love # Perfect Love #Look Up! #Let's Sing a Song of Love # (She Will) Take You Down #Wishful Thinking ==References== * Category:Patrice Rushen albums Category:1996 compilation albums
title: Forget Me Nots and Remind Me
